channel.title: SIMS runtime error
channel.description:
I get an error 'the program requested the runtime to end it in an unusual way' when I run sim city societies deluxe in vista. I run a notebook that has well aboe the minimum specs. Can i make the runtime ignore the app's requests to end it?
please help.
